title: Utaite Wiki Fandom Utilities
description: A collection of tools to help manage and improve the Utaite Wiki

features.title: Song Covers Template Counter
features.description: Analyzes and counts old song template transclusions across the wiki, providing valuable statistics and insights.

features.title: Convert Song Template Utility
features.description: Converts old Song covers template transclusion to NotableUtattemita template transclusion format.

features.title: Song to Utattemita Template Converter
features.description: Converts old Song template format to new Utattemita format with TabberType2 structure.

features.title: Album Data Formatter
features.description: Album Data Formatter for creating consistently structured album data entries with proper field naming, supporting both combined and separate title formats for multilingual content.

features.title: Album Info to AlbumType2 Converter
features.description: Converts raw album information into the AlbumType2 template format, automatically handling field mapping, stream links, and track formatting for wiki pages.

features.title: Album Template Parser
features.description: Album Template Parser that extracts information from existing Album templates, providing a convenient way to retrieve and reuse album data fields in different formats.

features.title: JSON to FUCE Converter
features.description: Converts JSON data into FUCE template transclusion format for easy integration with wiki pages.

features.title: Subtitle Format Converter
features.description: A versatile subtitle format converter that transforms SRT, VTT, and ASS/SSA subtitle files between formats, allowing for easy conversion while preserving timing and formatting.
bullets: Supports SRT, VTT, and ASS/SSA formats

features.title: WOFF/WOFF2 to Base64 Converter
features.description: Convert WOFF and WOFF2 font files to Base64 encoded data URLs, allowing for direct embedding in CSS files and HTML documents.
bullets: Support for both WOFF and WOFF2 formats

features.title: TTF to Base64 Converter
features.description: TTF font converter that transforms TrueType fonts into Base64 encoded data URLs for web embedding, with multi-file processing capabilities.

features.title: WOFF to Base64 Converter
features.description: Simple WOFF to Base64 converter that creates data URLs from Web Open Font Format files for direct use in web stylesheets.
